name: depository
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a place, especially a large building, for storing things: The government is having difficulty finding a safe depository for nuclear waste. Synonym
repository
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Buildings for storing things
armoury
arsenal
barn
bike shed
boathouse
commercial
fulfilment centre
godown
granary
lock (something) up
lumberyard
magazine
root cellar
shed
silo
store
storehouse
warehouse
warehousing
Add to word list
Add to word list
a place where money or official documents can be stored safely: The documents are currently in a depository in Minnesota.
COMMERCE a place where goods can be safely stored to be collected later: Trucks unloaded cargo at the depository's rear loading docks. See also
night depository
